sentences.en: " Tell him we'll be at Sherry's until eight o'clock.
sentences.cn: “ 告诉他,8点钟之前我们在谢丽饭店.

sentences.en: Alex jumped up so violently that he overturned his glass of sherry.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯一下子暴跳起来，结果把他那杯雪利酒都打翻了。

sentences.en: All sherry is made from wine fortified with brandy.
sentences.cn: 所有的雪利酒都是在葡萄酒中加入白兰地勾兑成的。

sentences.en: Cook pieces of succulent chicken with ample garlic and a little sherry.
sentences.cn: 烹饪鲜美滑嫩的鸡肉时多加些大蒜，并滴入少许雪利酒。

sentences.en: Drink up your sherry and we'll go.
sentences.cn: 喝完你的雪利酒我们就走。

sentences.en: Have a glass of sherry. I always keep a bottle here.
sentences.cn: 来一杯雪利酒吧. 我这儿总是经常备着一瓶.

sentences.en: I poured us a glass of sherry.
sentences.cn: 我给大家倒了杯雪利酒。

sentences.en: She came back, smoothing her hair, poured herself a sherry, too.
sentences.cn: 她走回屋里, 掠了掠她的头发, 给自己也倒了杯酒.

sentences.en: She had seen notices of dances, parties, balls, and suppers at Sherry's.
sentences.cn: 她见过关于在谢丽饭店举行舞会 、 聚会 、 大型舞会和晚宴的通告.

sentences.en: She swore by her inferior sherry to me.
sentences.cn: 她极力向我推荐她的劣质雪利酒。

sentences.en: Sherry is black, tall, slender and soft-spoken.
sentences.cn: 谢里是个黑人，身材高挑，细声细语。

sentences.en: Sherry is half as strong again as table wine.
sentences.cn: 雪利酒比佐餐酒酒劲强一半。

sentences.en: The Misses So - and - so would give a party on Wednesday evening at Sherry's.
sentences.cn: 某某 小姐兹定于星期三晚上假座谢丽饭店举行晚会.

sentences.en: We have both sweet and dry sherry.
sentences.cn: 甜和不甜的雪利酒我们都有.

sentences.en: We have gin, whisky and sherry; which will you have?
sentences.cn: 我们有杜松子酒 、 威士忌酒和雪莉酒.你要喝哪一种?

sentences.en: We sipped dry sherry on his porch until sunrise, and shortly thereafter he moved in to my small Florida home.
sentences.cn: 我们在他家的门廊上啜饮着干雪利酒，直到太阳升起。 此后不久，他搬进了我在佛罗里达的小家。

words.tran_cn: [食品]雪利酒（西班牙产的一种烈性白葡萄酒）；葡萄酒

trans.tran_en: a pale or dark brown strong wine, originally from Spain
